articles.title: Pat Cummins to captain SRH in IPL 2024 - Cricbuzz
articles.description: The star fast bowler, signed by the Hyderabad franchise for INR 20.5 crores, led Australia to the WTC and World Cup crowns in 2023
articles.content:
Pat Cummins enjoyed great success as captain in 2023. © Getty
Star Australia fast bowler Pat Cummins has been named captain of Sunrisers Hyderabad ahead of the forthcoming 2024 season of the IPL. Cu… [+1437 chars]
